ygData.subject: Re: spell procs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I get weapon procs interrupted all the time while chasing mobs down, in particular the vamp embrace proc, but it s happened with Dark Reaver as well. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> i dont think these are weapon procs.. NO weapon proc has a delay higher than
> 0.1 seconds, or it'd be interrupted during normal combat movement. also no
> weapon proc has a time delay after using..
>

I get weapon procs interrupted all the time while chasing mobs
down, in particular the vamp embrace proc, but it's happened with
Dark Reaver as well.

> by the way, how do you read the .eff files without getting a bunch of
> gobbldegook? :)
>

Learn to read in Hexadecimal =) Get a hex editor and do an ascii
search on Life Leech. I would _not_ change anything in this file
however. Basically, darkflame.org has everything already tehre,
so just read their site for the info.

Xilith
